references.reason: This paper introduces Task Arithmetic, a fundamental model merging method that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: TIES-merging: Resolving interference when merging models
references.reason: This paper addresses the issue of interference in model merging, a key challenge that the current paper also tackles and improves upon.

references.paper_title: Localizing task information for improved model merging and compression
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it focuses on improving model merging performance and compression, which are also central themes of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Task singular vectors: Reducing task interference in model merging
references.reason: This paper is closely related as it uses singular value decomposition (SVD) to analyze and improve model merging, similar to the approach taken in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Model merging with SVD to tie the knots
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it also utilizes SVD for model merging, providing a comparative approach to the method proposed in the current paper.
